i Fucking love it The portal Series/ Fangames Are Amazing I recomend you Checking this game Out! its worth the 9 dollars and 99 cents :D
Fun.  Story is 100 times better. With comunity maps it's very fresh with content. Co-op is a blast. One downside would be that there are cosmetics that could be paid in game. wtf valve?

The puzzles, the story, the humor is amazing. The whole concept of being able to use portals to get onto platforms and avoid lasers really offers a sense of creativity. Some puzzles can be tedious, but just by playing around with the environment will sometimes open up a new perspective that can allow you to escape the test chamber. Lastly, the level design is mind-blowing. 10/10 would catch a box in mid-air again.

This is a rather fun game. If you have a friend to play with, this game can be a whole ton of fun. I highly recommend this game. Being able to solve puzzels with your friend, or even doing some of the dumbest things possible in this game. It is all good fun. If you're wondering about the single player mode, the story is very interesting. Finding out how to solve puzzels yourself could also be fun. All in all, I enjoyed this game and hope you all do too.

If you enjoy puzzle solving and than being able to create your very own puxxles than you will enjoy fbis game. Portal 2 has fun, creavtive and enjoyable characters. They took the simple game of Portal and bumped it to the max. They made the game harder, but still fun. It is also great to play around kids. There is no swearing and a small amount of gore. (Like its so small that the only time you see it is when the turrets are shooting at you and even then you have to look for it. So there is like no blood hat so ever honestly.) The remarks that some of the chahracters make will fly right over kids heads. If tou are looking for something new that everyone has been talking about since 2011 than give this game a try.
Einfach episch, genial und empfehlenswert.

Si queres pasar un rato hechandote unos buenos Puzzel's este juego es para ti.

Graficos 4/5 ( Es un motor grafico viejo, pero con un Buen PC puedes obtener graficos ''decentes'' )
Jugabilidad 5/5 ( No encontre ningun bug )
Dificultad '' Intermedia '' ( Se va poniendo mas dificil )
Servidores 2/5 ( Tardan mucho en cargar )
Multijugador 2/5 ( La experiencia no es tan buena )
CampaÃ±a ( Es buena pero podria ser mejor, Terminando la campaÃ±a desbloqueas niveles secretos en mayor dificultad )

Recomendacion? Positiva si eres de las personas que les gusta hecharse unas buenas horas frente al ordenador pensando para pasar las dificultades a un sierto nivel.
The only reason i still play this game is because you can create and upload your own chambers. is nice

Now that i finally Played and beat this game it is one of my all time favorites. Gameplay-physics steller humor smart and voice acting is world class. Instant Classic!!! Buy it now if you have never played it!
